3: Miyi's back...
Bianca, my child, do not be upset.
Miyi has finished his purpose, he came back, and he protected the bag till the very end.
There are cans and fruit inside...
It's still not enough, is it, my child?
There are young mothers and infants here looking for shelter.
Father, I have a question. God said to love people and your enemies.
If I can't love the enemies because of the people I love...
You mean... the mechanoid, right? My child.
Yes... Father.
The death of Miyi... I still... cannot forgive.
... I am a sinner, Father.
We're all guilty, including... me.
Follow your heart, my child.
Follow my heart...
Father, I want to take everyone outside.
Father! What's wrong? Did you give all your food away again...
No... I'm fine.
Bianca, wait!
I... don't need saving.
Go outside. You are brave, Bianca.
...Bianca... You have always been a gentle, yet strong and brave child...
Go south of the snow plain.
Quickly, before the blizzard starts again.
You should be able to reach the Southern Diocese. There should be an army stationed there... There will be a way...
...Father, do you plan to stay here?
I... must stay here, I must stay here, by myself...
To guard this church... This...... It's my choice. It's my faith, Bianca.
Go Bianca, go into the light...
Lead people to where God can see, I will pray for you here, for everybody.
God loves the world, Bianca.
